summary: An ordinance relating to and making an appropriation for the purpose of carrying out, the plan or system of additions and betterments to the municipal light and power plant and system, authorized by Ordinance No. 36852, approved December 22, 1916, as amended by Ordinance No. 38065, approved December 27, 1917, and Ordinance No. 38469, approved May 27, 1918.
